channel.title: Stephen Massicotte on Bloomington Playwrights Project
channel.description: Recent content in Stephen Massicotte on Bloomington Playwrights Project

item.title: The Jedi Handbook
item.description: A not so long time ago, in a theater not so far away, came a film that rocked the galaxy – changing both cinema and schoolyards forever… The Jedi Handbook is a coming of age story about a young boy who survives growing older with help from The Force. Experiencing the Star Wars franchise anew, through the eyes and imagination of a kid, The Jedi Handbook takes us on a nostalgic journey back to an era we can all relate to – our childhood.
